account_data_map.strategic_priority_summary: Unilever's strategic priorities include delivering strong performance in Beauty & Wellbeing and Personal Care, accelerating shift to premium and digital commerce, and improving emerging market performance. The company is also focused on outperforming markets, with a strong competitive performance in developed markets and an improved performance in emerging markets.
account_data_map.risk_summary: macroeconomic pressure, supply chain challenges, regulatory challenges, economic sensitivity, inflation
